title: Blended Learning Design Strategies for Online Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering concepts and fundamental understanding of online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service elementary teachers to cultivate online engineering education design skills via project-based assessment in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more online engineering education activities suitable for blended learning models.
Learners can develop and present two or more interaction strategies applicable in smartphone environments.
Learners can specify methods for measuring learner engagement using project-based assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
